item.title: Light timing at junction, 14th December
item.description:
The timing of these lights has been changed. The phasing for vehicles travelling along Bromley Common in & out of Bromley is about 8 seconds. This is causing severe congestion & is affecting busses as well as ambulances. This needs sorting urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken and battered street works, 14th December
item.description:
For Covid the pavement was widened with these works. Covid has passed and the works have been abandoned by the council. The bollards have disappeared and the concrete/paving stones have come loose. This needs to be removed and retuned to the original configuration. It looks awful and is dangerously for pedestrians who are no longer protected by bollards, and dangerous for car drivers who do not see the stones in the middle of the road. The bollards were removed every night by vandals in the days when they existed, so replacing the bollards is not the answer! Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 157, New Kent Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
